seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, responsibilities align with mid-level ETL development and support

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities involve ETL, data modeling, and warehouse development

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicitly mentions ETL jobs, Control-M batch processing, and data warehouse focus with Snowflake and DBT

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management; responsibilities are individual contributor focused (development, testing, support)

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction; tools listed (Snowflake, DBT, Unix, Control-M) are platform-agnostic

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Control M Batch processing' and ETL workflows, no streaming or real-time technologies referenced

orchestrator_category.evidence: Control-M is a batch scheduler similar to Airflow; no other orchestrators mentioned, but Control-M is a classic batch orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake is explicitly mentioned as the data warehouse platform; no data lake or lakehouse technologies referenced

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Kochi, Kerala, India' with onsite work model; implies must be in that region

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Kochi, Kerala) with onsite requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Kochi, Kerala, India implies relocation may be required if not already based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location is India, not US; no mention of visa sponsorship; IBM India likely hires locally

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Based in India; OPT/CPT are US student visa categories; not applicable

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required; no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position in India; standard employment model for IBM India is W2 equivalent

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned; general reference to 'delivering deep technical expertise' but no promotion ladder or growth path defined

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working in 'Client Innovation Centers' with 'deep technical expertise' and 'team effort', suggesting collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description or Pass 1

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.) mentioned; inferred from IBM's general structure but not stated in job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (ETL, Snowflake, DBT, SQL, Control-M) with no nice-to-haves; education preferred but not required; 3+ years experience specified

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on ETL development, data modeling, and warehouse support; responsibilities are well-defined and specific to data engineering

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (ETL, SQL, Snowflake, DBT, Control-M) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer with 3+ years experience
